category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_refresh_bom_window_on_save
preference.preference_description: Defines which BOM window should be refreshed at the end of a Save process. Possible values: - ACTIVE: Refresh the active BOM window - OF_TOP_LEVEL: Refresh the BOM window corresponding to the saved assembly - IF_SAVE_PROD: Refresh the BOM window corresponding to the saved assembly only when products are saved - NONE: No refresh is done at the end of a save process
